meanings.sent1: The necklace was the beadiest accessory she owned.
meanings.sent2: Her bracelet was the beadiest piece of jewelry she wore.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her beadiest necklace made her feel like a queen of beads.
meanings.sent4: The beadiest curtains in the room added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The beadiest dress she wore sparkled under the lights.

meanings.definition: Showing the most intense or extreme level of a quality.
meanings.sent1: The beadiest look of determination was in his eyes.
meanings.sent2: Her beadiest smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: He gave his beadiest glare when he was upset.
meanings.sent4: The beadiest excitement filled the air as the party began.
meanings.sent5: The beadiest joy spread across her face when she heard the good news.
